name: California LifeLine Program
description: CPUC offers the California LifeLine Program to provide discounted home phone, cell phone, and broadband services to qualified low-income residents of California. Eligibility: - Program or Income based qualification Required Documents: - Proof of enrollment in qualifying public assistance program(s) - Proof of household’s total annual gross income How to Apply: - Contact your phone company to begin application process. - Application must be submitted online or by mail. Open Hours: - Monday to Fri

address: 505 Van Ness Avenue, San Francisco, California, 94102
